text: I was flying over a beautiful landscape with mountains and rivers. The feeling was incredible - pure freedom and joy. I could control my flight by thinking about where I wanted to go.
I was being chased by a dark figure through endless corridors. My heart was pounding and I couldn't find an exit. The fear was overwhelming and I woke up in a cold sweat.
I was swimming in crystal clear water with dolphins. The water was warm and peaceful. I felt completely at ease and connected with nature.
I was falling from a great height, tumbling through clouds. The sensation was terrifying but also strangely exhilarating. I woke up just before hitting the ground.
I was back in my old school, taking an exam I hadn't studied for. The anxiety was intense as I stared at questions I couldn't answer. Everyone else seemed to know what they were doing.
